alert.note: Alert for Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jones, southwestern Lenoir and northeastern Duplin Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kornegay, or 14 miles east of Warsaw, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kornegay, Beulaville, Potters Hill, Albertson and Sarecta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
